desc: Sixtyone20 Candles offers you 100% Soy Wax candles and Melts. Handpoured in small batches in Bloomington, Indiana. We also offer car freshies in a variety of shapes and scents. Our candles, melts and car freshies are available for purchase online. Choose from our collection of best selling bakery and fruit scents.

layout.text:
Scents that evoke memories and offer instant comfort.
Handpoured in Bloomington, Indiana
